title.value:
This is a dojo.data store implementation. It can take in either a Javascript array, JSON string, or URL as the data source. Data is expected to be in the following format: 

[
    { "key1": "value1" },
    { "key2": "value2" }
]

This is to mimic the Java Properties file format. Each 'item' from this store

is a JS object representing a key-value pair. If an item in the above array has more than one key/value pair, only the first will be used/accessed.
